comment:
Maximize net profit:To maximize net profit means to generate the highest possible profit after considering all costs and revenues.
Combo package:A combo package is a bundled offering that includes multiple items or products together at a discounted price compared to purchasing each item individually.
Banana-haters package:A banana-haters package is a specific package designed for customers who do not like bananas, typically including items other than bananas to cater to their preferences.
